original_text: A crowd of people was sitting around Jesus. Somebody said to him, ‘Look! Your mother and brothers are outside. They are looking for you.’
korean_text: 무리가 예수를 둘러 앉았다가 여짜오되 보소서 당신의 어머니와 동생들과 누이들이 밖에서 찾나이다

sentences.original_text: A crowd of people was sitting around Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 무리를 지어 예수님 주위에 앉아 있었다.

sentences.original_text: Your mother and brothers are outside.
